NAME: Ping - Response Time For Red (Kinda Inaccurate)
SHORT: A Ping System that is better than the current one on Red
DESCRIPTION:
Inaccurate Ping/Pong Timer. Based on Ping by iRDumb 

Please submit issues if you find any bugs or have suggestions.
